pages.text: When you finally have a place to call home you might have a use for sending loot and ores home while out adventuring, without having to run back everytime your inventory gets full. Then an Ender Pouch is a perfect companion to an Ender Chest. And ender puch share it's inventory with a linked Ender Chest.
You link the puch to an Ender Chest by using it on the chest while sneaking.
